text: jekara kise aurata nu apane pati de valom duravihara da dara hove tam isa vica ko'i hani nahim ki dovem apisa vica ko'i samajhauta kara laina ate samajhauta bihatara hai ate lalaca manukha de subha'a vica vasi'a ho'i'a hai. Jekara tusim caga vihara karo ate dina asare kama lavem tam jo kujha tusim karoge alaha usa tom janu hai
